title: Test your ping before you start playing PLEASE!
body:
Go into a custom game or run a ping test before you start playing Normal or Ranked games, sick to death of people getting into games and instantly complaining about massive ping spikes or consistent lag, then saying it's unplayable and they have to leave the game for 20 minutes to fix it, fair enough if the problem starts mid way through the game or the issue is on riots end, but if you know your internet consistently suffers from serious connection problems e.g. packet loss, ping spikes or frequent disconnections then please just don't play until you get the issues with your internet under control, otherwise you just ruin the game for everyone else on your team especially in ranked. Tyvm. 

TLDR; Don't play with a sh*t internet connection.
